p.s: First of all, let me thank you for creating this beautiful and meaningful poem.
I am honoured to receive such an ornate sonnet.
I really enjoyed reading it and I cannot stop to do so.
I can feel how laborious you worked on creating it and that you put your heart and blood into it.
The sonnet shows how capable you are in understanding and rebuilding human emotions while expressing them with expertise!
I like that you wrote about themes, that are timeless such as love, disbelief, sadness and so on.
At some point, I had to get deep into my inner self and think about some aspects of love, which I never questioned.
That is because the speaker asked so many rhetorical questions.
I felt connected to the speaker and identified myself with their character.
That shows how good you know about the human psyche, better than any writterwriter before and after you.
Also your special way of connecting different emotions is unbelievable and quietquite interesting.
And there are many reasons for your rellevancerelevance still today!
No man ever accomplished that has made words got into the dictionary and are in use today.
But also your phrases that people use in our every day language, or fascinating.
Even if we do not know much about your private life we know exactly what kind of person you are based on the way you wrote those many sonnets.
